<ab type="alignmentChunk" xml:id="{$chunk}">
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <anchor type="collate" xml:id="C23"/><lb n="c57-0066__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0066.01" unit="tei:head"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> Chap. 9 <shi rend="underline"></shi> <anchor xml:id="c57-0066.01"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0066__main__2"/>The creature <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> finished <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> speaking <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> and fixed his <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0066__main__3"/><mod sID="c57-0066__main__d4e13038"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0066__main__d4e13040">eyes</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0066__main__d4e13043"/>looks <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0066__main__d4e13043"/><mod eID="c57-0066__main__d4e13038"/> on <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> me in expectation of a <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0066__main__d4e13047"/> <mdel>n</mdel> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0066__main__d4e13051">answer<mdel>.</mdel> </del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0066__main__d4e13056"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0066__main__d4e13056"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0066__main__d4e13062"/>reply. <sga-add eID="c57-0066__main__d4e13062"/><mod eID="c57-0066__main__d4e13047"/><lb n="c57-0066__main__4"/>But I was <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> bewilde <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0066__main__d4e13068">r</del> red & perplexed <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> & unable <lb n="c57-0066__main__5"/>to arrange my ideas sufficiently to <w ana="start"/>under<lb n="c57-0066__main__6"/>stand<w ana="end"/> the <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> meaning <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> of his proposition. He <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0066__main__7"/>continued. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0066__main__8"/>You <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> must create a female for <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0066__main__9"/>me <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> with whom I can live in the <lb n="c57-0066__main__10"/>interchange of those sympathies necessary <lb n="c57-0066__main__11"/>for my <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> being <mod sID="c57-0066__main__d4e13093"/> <mdel>–</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0066__main__d4e13097"/>; <sga-add eID="c57-0066__main__d4e13097"/><mod eID="c57-0066__main__d4e13093"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> This you alone can <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> do &<lb n="c57-0066__main__12"/>I <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> demand of you as a right which you <lb n="c57-0066__main__13"/>must not <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> refuse. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0066__main__14"/>As he said <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> this <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> I could no longer suppress <lb n="c57-0066__main__15"/>the <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> anger <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> that burned within me. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> I <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> do <lb n="c57-0066__main__16"/>refuse <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> it, <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> I <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> replied, & <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> no torture shall ever <lb n="c57-0066__main__17"/>extort a consent from <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> me – <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> You may <lb n="c57-0066__main__18"/>render me the most miserable of <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> men <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <lb n="c57-0066__main__19"/>but you shall never make me base <lb n="c57-0066__main__20"/>in my own eyes. Shall I create another like <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0066__main__21"/>yourself <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> whose joint wickedness <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> would <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <lb n="c57-0066__main__22"/>desolate the <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> world? Begone –I <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> have <w ana="start"/>answer<lb n="c57-0066__main__23"/>ed<w ana="end"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> you – <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> You may <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> kill me <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> but I will <lb n="c57-0066__main__24"/>never <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> consent. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0066__main__25"/>You <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> are in the <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> wrong, <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> replied <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> he, &<lb n="c57-0066__main__26"/>instead <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> of <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> threatening <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> I am content to reason <lb n="c57-0066__main__27"/>with you. I am <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0066__main__d4e13145">wick</del> malicious, <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> because <lb n="c57-0066__main__28"/>I am <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> miserable. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> Am I not shunned <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> &<lb n="c57-0066__main__29"/>hated <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> by all mankind? <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> You <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> my <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> creator <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <lb n="c57-0066__main__30"/>would tear me to <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> pieces <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> & <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> triumph –<w ana="start"/>Rem<lb n="c57-0066__main__31"/>ember<w ana="end"/> that <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> & tell me why I should pity <lb n="c57-0066__main__32"/>man more than he pities <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> me. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> You <lb n="c57-0066__main__33"/>would not call it <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> murder <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> if you <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <w ana="start"/>preci<lb n="c57-0066__main__34"/>pitated<w ana="end"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> me into one of those <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> ice rifts &<lb n="c57-0066__main__35"/>destroyed <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> my frame, the work of your <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0066__main__d4e13174"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0066__main__d4e13176"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0066__main__d4e13176"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0066__main__d4e13182"/>own <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0066__main__d4e13182"/><mod eID="c57-0066__main__d4e13174"/>hands. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0066__main__36"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0066__main__d4e13188">And</del> shall I respect <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> man <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> when he <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <w ana="start"/>con-<lb n="c57-0066__main__37"/>temns<w ana="end"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> me? Let him live with me in <lb n="c57-0066__main__38"/>the interchange of <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> kindness and <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> instead of <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0067__main__1"/>injury <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> I would bestow every benefit <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13212"/>upon him <sga-add eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13212"/>with <lb n="c57-0067__main__2"/>tears of gratitude at his acceptance. But <lb n="c57-0067__main__3"/>that cannot be; <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13219"/> <mdel>T</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13223"/>t <sga-add eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13223"/><mod eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13219"/> he <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> human senses are <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0067__main__d4e13228">an</del> <lb n="c57-0067__main__4"/>insurmountable barriers to our union. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0067__main__5"/>But <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> mine shall not the submission of abject <lb n="c57-0067__main__6"/>slavery. I will revenge my <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> injuries <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0067__main__d4e13237">&</del> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> if I <lb n="c57-0067__main__7"/>cannot inspire <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> love <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> I will cause <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> fear <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <lb n="c57-0067__main__8"/>and chiefly <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13245"/>towards <sga-add eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13245"/>you my <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> arch-enemy <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> because <lb n="c57-0067__main__9"/>my <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> creator; <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0067__main__d4e13250">I w</del> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> do I swear <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13253"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0067__main__d4e13255">unutterable</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13258"/>inextinguishable <sga-add eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13258"/><mod eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13253"/><lb n="c57-0067__main__10"/>hatred– <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> I will work <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> & destroy <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> nor finish <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0067__main__11"/>untill <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> I desolate your <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> heart <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> so that you <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <lb n="c57-0067__main__12"/>curse the hour of your birth." A <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> fiend <lb n="c57-0067__main__13"/>-ish <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> rage animated him as he said <lb n="c57-0067__main__14"/>this; his face was wrinkled into contortions <lb n="c57-0067__main__15"/>too horrible for human eyes to behold; <lb n="c57-0067__main__16"/>but presently he calmed <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> himself, <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> &<lb n="c57-0067__main__17"/>proceeded. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0067__main__18"/>I <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> intended to reason. This passion <lb n="c57-0067__main__19"/>is detrimental to <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> me, <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> for you do not <lb n="c57-0067__main__20"/>reflect <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> that <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> you <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> are the <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13288"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13290"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13290"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13296"/>sole <sga-add eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13296"/><mod eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13288"/> cause <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13301"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13303"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13303"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13309"/>of its <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> excesses. <sga-add eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13309"/><mod eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13301"/>. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> If <lb n="c57-0067__main__21"/>any being felt emotions of benevolence <lb n="c57-0067__main__22"/>towards <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> me <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> I should return <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> then <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> an <lb n="c57-0067__main__23"/>hundred & <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> a <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> hundred fold; for that <lb n="c57-0067__main__24"/>one <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> creature's sake <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> I would make peace <lb n="c57-0067__main__25"/>with the whole <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> kind– <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> But I now indulge <lb n="c57-0067__main__26"/>in dreams <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13328"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13330"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13330"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13336"/>of bliss <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13336"/><mod eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13328"/>that cannot be <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> realized. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> What <lb n="c57-0067__main__27"/>I <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0067__main__d4e13342">a</del> ask of you is reasonable and <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> moderate. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <lb n="c57-0067__main__28"/>I demand a creature of another <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> sex <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> but <lb n="c57-0067__main__29"/>as hideous as <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> myself. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> The gratification is <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0067__main__30"/>small <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> but it is all that I can <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> receive <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <lb n="c57-0067__main__31"/>and it shall content me.
